title: Heepsteria! - A Tribute to Uriah Heep-2000
description:
Heepsteria is 33 tracks of varying quality by numerous B-list bands, the cuts
selected by fans via the internet, with some recorded in Ken Hensley&#039;s
studio. Overall the standard is very good, as some outfits (such as the Easy
Livin&#039; Band) get extremely close to the trademark Uriah Heep sound - often
with near exact emulation. Bronz produce a solid heavy version or two,
although like several other acts, they suffer from the extensive use of
programming. Still, Denny Ball&#039;s Firefly is atmospheric and , with old boys
Ken Hensley and John Lawton taking part, this set is well put together, if
over produced. Great fun albeit for total fanatics only.

CD1

1.  Bird of Prey - Easy Linin, Band
2.  The Wizard - Clive Rodgers and Cobra
3.  Stealin, - Native Son
4.  Rain - Dreamer(featuring Ken Hensley)
5.  Sympathy - John Lawton and Gunhill
6.  Real Turned On - Doublr Trouble
7.  July Morning - Featherwheel
8.  Medley:- Lawton/Hulme
    a. Return to Fantasy
    b. Magicians Birthday
    c. Wonderworld
9.  Sweet Lorraine - Easy Livin, Band
10. Thats How i Am - Native Son
11. Come Back To Me - John Lawton and Gunhill
12. Sunrise - Dreamer
13. The Other Side of Midnight
14. Firefly - Denny Ball


CD2

1.  The Journey pt1 - Dave White Band
2.  Easy Livin, - Dreamer
3.  All My Life - Bronz
4.  Circus - Hilme/Dreher Band
5.  Circle of Hands - Dreamer (featuring Ken Hensley)
6.  Look at Yourself - Easy Livin, Band
7.  The Soldier - Trevor Hensley and Ken Hensley
8.  No Other Way - Trevor Hensley and Ken Hensley
9.  Gypsy - Cosmic Banditos
10. River of Dreams - Wagner,White and Hulme
11. Time to Live - Dreamer
12. Rainbow Demon - PLT
13. Love Machine - Mojo Blues Band
14. Tales - Stella and Trevor Hensley
15. The Easy Road - Stella and Trevor Hensley
16. Come Away Melinda - Dave White Band
17. I Wanna Be Free - Dreamer
18. Return To Fantasy - Easy Livin&#039; Band
19. Gypsy(alternate version)Phil Lanzon
